0: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR AN ON-SITE HOUSING PROGRAM FOR TEACHERS
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07154
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR AN ON-SITE HOUSING PROGRAM FOR TEACHERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Roa-Puno (000 2018-02-28)2. Tambunting (000 2018-02-28)
3. Lopez (M.L.) (000 2018-03-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-08-29
      2. Referred to the Subcommittee on 2018-08-29
          -The committee decided, upon the motion of Rep. Wilter “Sharky” Wee Palma II, to refer the bills on Housing Program for Teachers to the Subcommittee on Housing for the Low-Income and Marginalized Sector, chaired by Rep. Jose Christopher Y. Belmonte -House Bills No. 4281, 4508, 6845 and 7154
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-02-12
